mapper.select: select distinct c.courseID, c.name as courseName, e.startTime as startExamTime, e.examTime, e.classroomID from tcsnamelist as tl left join teachclass as tc on tl.teachClassID = tc.teachClassID left join examschedule as e on tc.teachClassID = e.teachClassID left join course as c on tc.courseID=c.courseID where tl.studentID = #{studentID} and tc.startDate > #{startDate} and #{endDate} > tc.endDate and e.startTime > 0
